column4: anybody know an easy and great way to add a 3rd harddisk in a computer case that only have 2 slots for them?

good luck :)
for the simple cases you can use Applications/Add-Remove..., that tells you what and where...

: it say everything you have in your computer : cpu, motherboard, ram
: bios, every material things
you want sysinfo

np :)
you will find it in applications/system tools :)
